targets.expr: topk(8, (sum by (node_type, node_id, device) (label_replace(node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster='${cluster}',fstype='xfs',node_type='anvil'} - node_filesystem_free_bytes{cluster='${cluster}',fstype='xfs',node_type='anvil'}, 'node_id', '$1', 'instance', '([^.]+).*')) / sum by (node_type, node_id, device) (label_replace(node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster='${cluster}',fstype='xfs',node_type='anvil'}, 'node_id', '$1', 'instance', '([^.]+).*'))) * 100)

topk(8, (sum by (node_type, node_id, device) (label_replace(node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster='${cluster}',fstype='xfs',node_type='dsx'} - node_filesystem_free_bytes{cluster='${cluster}',fstype='xfs',node_type='dsx'}, 'node_id', '$1', 'instance', '([^.]+).*')) / sum by (node_type, node_id, device) (label_replace(node_filesystem_size_bytes{cluster='${cluster}',fstype='xfs',node_type='dsx'}, 'node_id', '$1', 'instance', '([^.]+).*'))) * 100)
